name: Horde Hunters (itch)
description:
The horde is here. Pick a hunter and defeat the demon invasion!

Horde Hunters takes the popular horde survival genre (aka bullet heaven) that Vampire Survivors started to new directions. It was built with some key ideas in mind from the very beginning;

Features
  • Twin-stick movement
  • Main weapon shoots where you aim while other weapons auto-fire
  • Unique weapon for each character
  • Unique ability for each character
  • No maximum number of weapons a character may carry
  • Items/consumables can be picked up and used when needed (no carry limit here either)
  • Gold is used during the run to buy/sell/upgrade your gear in a shop
  • Short runs (~15min to endgame) with a chance to continue playing beyond
  • Procedurally generated maps that have unique buildings you can interact with
  • Gameplay is active and gives you more control over how your run ends up
